choose.when: insert into board values (null, #{title}, #{contents}, 0, now(), (select ifnull(max(g_no), 0) + 1 from board a), 1, 0, #{userId })

select a.id, a.title, a.hit, date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') as regDate, a.depth, b.name as userName, a.user_id as userId from board a, user b where a.user_id = b.id order by g_no desc, o_no asc limit #{page}, #{size}
choose.otherwise: select a.id, a.title, a.hit, date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %p %h:%i:%s') as regDate, a.depth, b.name as userName, a.user_id as userId from board a, user b where a.user_id = b.id and (title like '%${keyword}%' or contents like '%${keyword}%') order by g_no desc, o_no asc limit #{page}, #{size}

mapper.select: select id, title, contents, g_no as groupNo, o_no as orderNo, depth, user_id as UserId from board where id = #{id}
mapper.update: update board set hit = hit + 1 where id=#{id}

choose.otherwise: select count(*) from board where title like '%${keyword}%' or contents like '%${keyword}%'
